Text: Hy!!! Thx for the Furuba!!!! I love it!!!! I didn't watch yet the whole thing, but is it serious that there's only 26 videos? The manga has more then 130 chapters, so its pretty unbelievable for me, but no matter how hard i try to find the rest on this piratebay, it seems like this is the whole thing...eehh...Thx again!!!! Bye^^

Yes, it's only 26 episodes. Despite a lot of fans asking to complete the manga -> anime adoption, the animation studio has not been willing to do it.
It's a shame, really.

This torrent has pretty much died.  I uploaded a more heavily seeded version (AVI and OGM instead of MOV, AVI and OGM) here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6090837/%5BAlpha_Anime%5D_Fruits_Basket_01_-_26_Complete
